li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children menu-item-6

div.h3: COVID-19 Update-East Penn School District Closed for the Remainder of the 2019/2020 School Year

div.p: As announced this morning by Governor Tom Wolf, the East Penn School District will be closed for the remainder of the 2019/2020 School Year. This decision was made to protect the health and safety of our students and community during the COVID-19 pandemic. While we have been preparing for this possible outcome for several weeks, news like this is never easy to hear. more details
